application_type_full: Outline planning permission: Some matters reserved
description: Redevelopment of part of the existing Gillespie Park and part of the upper level sidings to provide residential use to a maximum of 511 habitable rooms and the creation of an enlarged public open space on the remainder of the land and a right of way between Seven Sisters Road and Drayton Park as shown on submitted plan.
decision_conditions: To comply with the provisions of Section 42(2) of the Town and Country Planning Act 1971.
